Topic.Title: Is there any way at all to embed games?

Posts.EditableText: I've been going in circles on this for weeks now and it's driving me up a wall. I have a game that works fine on this website, but what I'd like to do is embed it on a different page entirely. I've tried sticking it in an iframe, which just comes up with a blank screen, and I tried just uploading the files to itch.io and gamejolt both, neither of which allow scrolling. Is there anything I can do? I'd really rather not just link the game if I can avoid it.

Posts.EditableText: I don't think this helps, but when I put the URL into a Google site, it embeds itself.
